#define MmReadRes (  ) 
Value:
{             \
    micromag_status = MM_READING_RES;         \
    MmSelect();               \
    /* trigger 2 bytes read */            \
    SSPDR = 0;              \
    SSPDR = 0;              \
    SpiEnable();              \
    SpiClearRti();              \
    SpiEnableRti();             \
  }
